title: Place your bets, Pantheon Rework!
body:
How will his rework treat him?

Will it be an overall improvement? (Morganna, Warwick, Taric)

Or will it be a horrible rework that either kills the champ, or becomes an unbalancable nightmare? (Akali, Irelia, Nunu, Urgot, Yorick, Kayle, etc etc etc)
